summary: This is a daily activities report and lieutenant's log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated July 23, 2019, documenting routine operations and security checks. The document is significant as it was created the day before Jeffrey Epstein's first reported suicide attempt in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is the inmate being held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, and his cell is specifically mentioned in the security checks.

events.title: Daily Operations at MCC
events.description: Routine security checks and operations at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including checks on inmate Jeffrey Epstein's cell.

keyFacts: The document is a daily activities report and lieutenant's log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) dated July 23, 2019.
It documents routine security checks and operations at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was being held.
The report was created the day before Epstein's first reported suicide attempt in custody on July 24, 2019.
